## decodeGray32 variable

Converts 32bit Gray code to binary / unsigned int.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray\_code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray_code)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decodeGray32: (x: number) => number
```
